settings.paragraph_text: *From 2/28/24, until 11:59 PM PT on 3/3/24, prices will be marked down as part of our Leap Year promotion. No code needed. Offer is available on oseamalibu.com and is not valid on previous purchases outside of the offer timeframe. No additional discount may be taken at checkout, quantities are limited. If an item goes out of stock during the promotion period, it cannot be purchased at the promotional price when it comes back in stock after the promotion period has ended. Once an order is submitted, we are not able to make any adjustments or cancellations to the order. Exceptions will not be granted. Offer not transferable or redeemable for cash. We reserve the right to modify or replace any part of these Terms and Conditions and terminate this offer at any time without notice. Offer subject to change in OSEA Malibuâ€™s sole discretion. Existing subscription orders do not qualify for this promotion.
